parameters.name: fd
parameters.description: A file descriptor associated with the object whose ACL you want to set.

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: The ACL that you want to assign to the object.

full_content:
Function: acl_set_fd
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/acl_set_fd.html
Synopsis: int acl_set_fd( int fd,
Headers: #include <sys/acl.h>
Parameters:
  - fd: A file descriptor associated with the object whose ACL you want to set.
  - acl: The ACL that you want to assign to the object.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <sys/acl.h>

int acl_set_fd( int fd,
                acl_t acl );
